name: FlyHajj
overview:
With nearly 25 million Muslims worldwide traveling to Makkah and Madinah for pilgrimage each year, FlyHajj is a one-stop traveling, accomodation and shopping online destination for pilgrims and companies.

For End-users:

FyHajj.com offers Hajj and Umrah travelers a wide number of packages offered by different travel companies across the globe on a single portal. The portal was created to address Hajj and Umrah travelers need for a comprehensive display of fares, rates, lodging, facilities, share hajj and umrah experiences, learning center and travel agents reviews in a single location.

For Companies:

  1. Offer Cloud Services: Widgets and tools that could help tour operators. This could mean tour operators managing their companies, packages, customers (also walk-in) etc on FlyHajj.com with full privacy and confidentiality.

  2. Establish B2B Marketplace where Service Providers, Hotel Owners, Tour Operators all come together and share information (hotel rates, transfer services, visa, etc). Offer opportunities to interact with participants in this marketplace. Increased automation in processes - instead of Emails or Phones or Excel Sheets - complete business process integration which would mean sending and receiving RFP (Req. for Proposal such as Hotel Room Reservation Requests) etc.
